projectGridLines.title: Title: Development of Data Ingestion and Transformation Pipeline for Cross-Platform Advertising Data
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Development of Data Ingestion and Transformation Pipeline for Cross-Platform Advertising Data


Description: This project involves building a data ingestion pipeline that fetches, transforms, and stores advertising data from multiple platforms (e.g., Google Ads, Facebook Ads) into Pixis's data lake using a lakehouse approach with Apache Iceberg. Students will work on optimizing the ingestion pipeline for performance, ensuring compliance with data security standards, and normalizing data to handle varying attribution windows, metrics, and demographic breakdowns from different platforms.


Skill sets: 

  • Proficiency in Python or Scala
  • Knowledge of Apache Iceberg, Apache Parquet
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS)
  • Basic understanding of AdTech and data pipeline concepts


Traits expectation: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a collaborative mindset.


Expected learning: 

  • Data engineering principles in AdTech
  • Designing high-performance ingestion and transformation pipelines
  • Understanding cross-platform data normalization and attribution complexities


Specific courses required for project execution: Data Engineering, Cloud Computing, Database Management Systems, Distributed Systems

projectGridLines.title: Title: Building Real-Time Analytics Dashboard for Ad Campaign Performance
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Building Real-Time Analytics Dashboard for Ad Campaign Performance


Description: The focus of this project is on creating a real-time analytics dashboard to monitor cross-platform ad campaign performance. Using data from Pixis's data lake, students will implement a solution to visualize metrics, trends, and KPIs for ad campaigns, handling high-throughput, low-latency reads from Apache Iceberg tables.


Skill sets: 

  • Proficiency in JavaScript (React/Angular)
  • Knowledge of data visualization libraries (D3.js, Plotly)
  • Familiarity with Apache Iceberg, Parquet
  • Understanding of real-time data processing (Kafka/Flink)


Traits expectation: Good communication skills, creativity in data visualization, strong teamwork skills.


Expected learning: 

  • Building scalable, real-time analytics dashboards
  • Handling high-performance data queries for visualization
  • Working with cross-platform metrics in a consolidated format


Specific courses required for project execution: Data Visualization, Real-Time Data Processing, Web Development, Databases

projectGridLines.title: Title: Rule Engine Design and Integration in Business Rule Management System (BRMS)
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Rule Engine Design and Integration in Business Rule Management System (BRMS)


Description: This project involves designing and integrating a modular, performant rule engine within Pixis's BRMS. The rule engine will handle large volumes of business rules to personalize ad strategies dynamically across multiple ad platforms. The students will focus on performance optimization, modular rule design, and integration with other Pixis data platform components.


Skill sets: 

  • Experience in designing and implementing rule engines
  • Knowledge of data modeling and database optimization
  • Familiarity with software architecture patterns and modular design


Traits expectation: Detail-oriented, strong in system design, adaptive to complex requirements.


Expected learning: 

  • Exposure to business rule management systems and rule engines
  • Modular design for scalable and extensible systems
  • Integration with other platform components for streamlined data processing


Specific courses required for project execution: Advanced Database Management, Software Architecture, AI in Business Applications, Systems Design

projectGridLines.title: Title: Product Analyst
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Product Analyst


Description: We're looking for an analytically sharp Product Analyst Intern to join our AdRoom team. AdRoom is our advanced AI platform that enables businesses to generate compelling product advertisements through generative AI. As an intern, you'll dive deep into data, exploring user interactions and uncovering insights that fuel product growth. This role offers a unique opportunity to work with data at the intersection of AI and product analytics, helping shape the future of AI-powered advertising


Skill sets: 

  • Conduct in-depth analysis of user interaction data, identifying patterns and opportunities to enhance user engagement with our AI tools
  • Use SQL and Python/R to analyze large datasets and distill actionable insights that drive product improvements
  • Design, execute, and interpret A/B tests to optimize features and understand their impact on user behavior and engagement
  • Build and maintain dashboards that track key performance indicators, offering teams a clear, data-driven view of product usage and adoption
  • Present findings and insights to stakeholders, highlighting trends and opportunities for growth


Traits expectation: Sharp analytical mindset with a curiosity for data driven insights Clear communication skills to explain complex data insights in accessible terms

Self-starter mentality with a proactive approach to problem-solving


Expected learning: 

  • In-depth analysis of user behavior patterns in real-world applications
  • How to drive product improvements through data insights and A/B testing
  • Advanced data visualization techniques for tracking product success


Specific courses required for project execution: 

  • Strong foundation in SQL for querying large datasets and analyzing user behavior
  • Proficiency in Excel/Google Sheets for data exploration and reporting
  • Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, PowerBI) to translate insights into clear, accessible visuals
  • Basic understanding of digital advertising metrics and A/B testing
